main event: A civilian witnessed a bright, star-like object that appeared stationary in the sky.
interesting points: The object was described as round and white,It was observed for about 1 minute,The sighting occurred in clear weather conditions,The object was noted to be in the same location as the planet Venus,The witness was a 34-year-old female housewife.
sighted object: a bright, round, white object in the sky
